    My Bulgaria Skiing Holiday

    A memoir by Max Jackson

    Prologue

    The day before the holiday, I managed to pack my clothes and anything I wanted to take with me. I’ve enjoyed going on holidays with the group Im going with. And so the big day begins tomorrow.

    Chapter 1 – Travelling Day

    I woke up around 3:30 am and was ready to go. Once I got to the airport, I met up with Ian again and I met Lucas and Chris for the first time. Got there safely and arrived at the hotel Im staying at 2 hours later. Dinner was really nice especially for being a buffet. Look forward to a full day tomorrow.

    Chapter 2 – First day of skiing

    After I had breakfast, I went to try on my ski gear. Thankfully it all fitted and after lunch, skiing began. I had the hang of it still while also following the professionals instructions. Then I went back to the hotel and chilled, had dinner and all in all another great day.

    Chapter 3 – Double Ski Day

    Today was another fun day. This time I went skiing twice during the day. Once in the morning and again in the afternoon. After that I went to the sauna with Ian and Chris. It felt very refreshing and relaxing.

    Chapter 4 – A Bigger Adventure

    Today has been an even greater day. Mainly because we went skiing in different areas. It was even more fun to go up the mountain. Also skied in both the morning and afternoon.

    Chapter 5 – A Day Off Skiing

    Another day and it was a relaxing day. We had a break from skiing and this time went for a day out to explore Bulgaria a little more. There was some nice culture and I brought myself a necklace with a blue owl on it.

    Chapter 6 – Back To Skiing

    During todays skiing, it was fun by taking it to the next level. Also had lunch in a different area than usual which was nice for a change.

    Chapter 7 – Last Day Of Skiing

    Today was not just any day but rather a special day. That is because it was the last full day of skiing. We went up the mountain again. I did very well despite losing control at one point when going up the slope. But thankfully I was okay. At the end, I thanked the instructor Constantine and I got my certificate.

    Epilogue

    Well the holiday is now over. After breakfast, I packed up all my stuff. Thankfully, Chris helped me out with my clothes bag. Went to the airport and hopped on the plane. Then I found Mum and got home safely.

    I went there and back again.

    The End

    Author: Max Jackson

    10 April 2025
